channel.title: [BETA] - KingPkz - Spawn - FUNPK - Crystal Key System - Vote System - Customs [B
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[B][SIZE=5]NOTE: Server is in BETA Mode. Only launched it for Testing purposes.[/SIZE][/B]
[CENTER][B]
[URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/38535602/KingPkz/client.Jar"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KjAnDsr.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://king-pkz.tk/"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NQO4lHn.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://playkingpkz.tk/"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wTrDXXi.png[/img][/URL] [/b][/center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wxhkHAq.png[/img]
[B]Info:
We used to have 40+ Players:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PJqO4vg.png[/img]
I have decided to work more on this source. I have realized that leaving this server last year was a huge mistake and I believe that I can bring my player base back with a little bit of work. I have decided to commit to this Project and hopefully make it succeed. I am turning 19 soon and want to set myself differently from all these young newcomers. I loved playing this source and would love to fully code it before releasing it.
First I would like to start off by giving credits for the people that have helped me so far:
+ Gretar (My inspiration) + Mr Giggles (Client+Source) + Project Insanity + Dwayne Wade (Webclient)
^ I will update the credits as I go along.
Second, I would like to list some of the features of the server (Will be updated as i go along)
Login Screen:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6K8h2TJ6P2E
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HSXn1ps.jpg[/img]
Welcome Message:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nebYpJh.png[/img]
Commands
[img]http://i.imgur.com/i5TDCww.png[/img]
Pre-Made Kits:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/x7NRNG6.gif[/img]
Place of altars/portals/custom iterface:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GQ8h4qJ.png[/img]
Shops:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R1f6sFa.png[/img]
Tab: Staff Assistance/King Pkz Book/Donator Teleport/Staff Teleport:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/WdjV9x3.png[/img]
Donator Zone:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Mf2lqwm.png[/img]
Zoom in and out:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SaFgYGt.png[/img]
Main Pre-Made kits: Master and Pure: (AGS is spawnable)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Yifa5Lz.png[/img]
Unspawnable items/Donator items message:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eSNIO14.png[/img]
Overloads:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DLe62Kk.png[/img]
Switching: For some reason, the gif is kinda slow. but it's definately flawless in-game :)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vz9I8YQ.gif[/img]
[/B][/CENTER]

@MasterPkz317 wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=5]NOTE: Server is in BETA Mode. Only launched it for Testing purposes.[/SIZE]

[CENTER][B]


[/b][/center]

wxhkHAq.png914×336

[B]Info:

We used to have 40+ Players:

PJqO4vg.png773×557

I have decided to work more on this source. I have realized that leaving this server last year was a huge mistake and I believe that I can bring my player base back with a little bit of work. I have decided to commit to this Project and hopefully make it succeed. I am turning 19 soon and want to set myself differently from all these young newcomers. I loved playing this source and would love to fully code it before releasing it.

First I would like to start off by giving credits for the people that have helped me so far:

  • Gretar (My inspiration)
  • Mr Giggles (Client+Source)
  • Project Insanity
  • Dwayne Wade (Webclient)

^ I will update the credits as I go along.
